attributes.action: Review the recent decision to not dock West Ham points for illegal transfer activity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sheffield United has been wrongly relegated to the Football League Championship due to the Premier Leagues decision not to deduct points due to the illegal transfer of Carlos Tevez and Javier Mascherano.  Football will suffer on the whole due to this wrong doing by the Premier League and the relegation of Sheffield United on 13th May 2007 was unfair and unjust.

We call on the Prime Minister to voice his opinion on this matter and discuss this with the powers that be in world sport and world football.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
